attacks.name: Careless Head
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Walk-Off Homer
attacks.text: If you use this attack when you have only 1 Prize card left, you win this game.

attacks.name: Frog Hop
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Brave Bird
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

ability.name: Nervous Seed
ability.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Basic Pokémon's attacks cost Colorless more.

attacks.name: Energy Press
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mystifying Horns
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Big Charge
attacks.text: If you have any Mega Evolution Pokémon on your Bench, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Blot
attacks.text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Boo-Hoo
attacks.text: If your opponent attaches an Energy card from his or her hand to the Defending Pokémon during his or her next turn, that Pokémon will be Asleep.

attacks.name: Leaf Slice
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Razor Shell
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Sudden Grip
attacks.text: If this Pokémon evolved from Shellder during this turn, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Siphon Off
attacks.text: Attach 3 Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shaky Fall
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused. That Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Water Duplicates
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Frogadier and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Snarl
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Luxray BREAK
text: Luxray BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.

attacks.name: Wild Fury
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

cards.name: Espeon-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Miraculous Shine
attacks.text: Devolve each of your opponent's evolved Pokémon and put the highest Stage Evolution card on it into your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Reflective Shield
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 5 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psy Report
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.

attacks.name: Energy Present
attacks.text: Attach up to 2 Energy cards from your hand to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: Trevenant BREAK
text: Trevenant BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.

attacks.name: Silent Fear
attacks.text: Put 3 damage counters on each of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Roll Up
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. If any of them are heads, your opponent reveals his or her hand. Then, for each heads, discard a card from your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Otherworldly Return
attacks.text: Put a Trainer card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Sing
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Double Slap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

cards.name: Togekiss-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Mighty Wind
attacks.text: You may attach an Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hurricane Wing

cards.name: Raticate BREAK
text: Raticate BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.

attacks.name: Super Fang
attacks.text: Put damage counters on your opponent's Active Pokémon until its remaining HP is 10.

cards.name: Ho-Oh-EX

ability.name: Purifying Fire
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon has any basic Fire Energy attached to it, you may heal 50 damage from it.

text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Elemental Feather
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Nyan Press
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

cards.name: Great Ball
text: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon you find there and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

cards.name: Max Elixir
text: Look at the top 6 cards of your deck and attach a basic Energy card you find there to a Basic Pokémon on your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

cards.name: Max Potion
text: Heal all damage from 1 of your Pokémon. If you do, discard all Energy attached to that Pokémon.

cards.name: Scizor Spirit Link
text: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Scizor-EX.

cards.name: Tierno
text: Draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Scizor-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.text: If this Pokémon was on the Bench and became your Active Pokémon this turn, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Stormy Seas

attacks.name: Splash Burn

attacks.name: Acid Spray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Fighting Fury Belt
text: The Basic Pokémon this card is attached to gets +40 HP and its attacks do 10 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Gyarados Spirit Link
text: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Gyarados-EX.

cards.name: Misty's Determination
text: Discard a card from your hand. If you do, look at the top 8 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

cards.name: Pokémon Catcher
text: Flip a coin. If heads, switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Potion
text: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

cards.name: Professor Sycamore
text: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.

cards.name: Psychic's Third Eye
text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. Discard as many cards as you like from your hand. Then, draw that many cards.

cards.name: Puzzle of Time
text: You may play 2 Puzzle of Time cards at once. • If you played 1 card, look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order. • If you played 2 cards, put 2 cards from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Reverse Valley
text: Choose which way this card faces before you play it. Any damage done to this ↓ player's Metal Pokémon by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Choose which way this card faces before you play it. The attacks of this ↓ player's Darkness Pokémon do 10 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

ability.name: Hyper Transfer
ability.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a basic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

text: Golduck BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.
